title: Leading brands on Facebook from Indonesia 2017 , by number of fans
yAxis: Number of fans on Facebook in millions
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in the y axis.
Month Mario Teguh has the highest Number of fans on Facebook in millions and Liputan6 has the lowest Number of fans on Facebook in millions.
The difference of Number of fans on Facebook in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 11.8.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of fans on Facebook in millions for 10 number of Months.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in the y axis.
Month Mario Teguh has the highest Number of fans on Facebook in millions and Liputan6 has the lowest Number of fans on Facebook in millions.
The difference of Number of fans on Facebook in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 11.8.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in the y axis.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
Month DRAWING PENCIL has the second highest value for Number of fans on Facebook in millions.
The highest Month Mario Teguh has 11.8 more Number of fans on Facebook in millions than the lowest Month Liputan6.
Number of fans on Facebook in millions at Month Mario Teguh is 19.99 , second place is DRAWING PENCIL at 12.91, and thirdly is Kompas.com at 11.05.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions has declined over the past 10 Months.
The Month Mario Teguh has 1.88 times more Number of fans on Facebook in millions than average.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is 106.49 if we add up values of all Months.
